label: Is loaded handgun carry permitted in all places other than courthouses, police stations, prisons, polling places, and school buildings, and private property without permission? (1=yes, 0=no)
"Saturday Night Special" ban? (1=yes, 0=no)
Local gun ban in place? (1=yes, 0=no)
Stricter minimum age to purchase or possess firearms than federal standard? (1=yes, 0=no)
Gun dealer regulation: mandatory theft reporting of all firearms (1=yes, 0=no)
Store security precautions required? (1=yes, 0=no)
Background checks required at private sales or gun shows? (1=yes, 0.5=locally, 0=no)
Design safety standards for handguns? (1=yes, 0=no)
Authorized user requirement for new handguns? (1=yes, 0=no)
Ballistic identification requirements? (1=yes, 0=no)
Ammunition microstamping required? (1=yes, 0=no)
State government required to purge background check records? (1=yes, 0=no)
State constitution contains individual right to keep and bear arms? (1=yes, 0=no)
Exclusive state control of retail sales of some types of beer (1=yes, 0=no)
Exclusive state control of wholesale sales of some types of beer (1=yes, 0=no)
Exclusive state control of retail sales of some types of wine (1=yes, 0=no)
Exclusive state control of retail sale of some types of spirits (1=yes, 0=no)
Exclusive state control of wholesale sale of some types of wine (1=yes, 0=no)
Exclusive state control of wholesale sale of some types of spirits (1=yes, 0=no)
Mandatory alcoholic beverage server training law (1=yes, 0=no)
Bans on off-premises Sunday sales of alcohol
Bans on off-premises Sunday sales of alcohol, with local option
Happy hour law? (1=yes, 0.5=locally, 0=no)
“Low-level” marijuana possession legal? (1=yes, 0=no)
First offense of “high-level” marijuana possession a misdemeanor? (1=yes, 0=no)
maximum amount of marijuana permitted for medical purposes? (1=law defines maximum, 0=no maximum)
Seat belt law for adults? (1=yes, 0=no)
Standard (primary) enforcement of belt use for adults? (1=yes,0=no)
Motorcycle helmet law covering all drivers? (1=yes, 0=no)
Motorcycle helmet law covering some riders? (1=yes, 0=no)
Bicycle helmet law exists? (1=yes, 0=no)
Open container law for automobile drivers or passengers? (1=yes, 0=no)
Sobriety checkpoints authorized? (1=yes, 0=no)
Auto liability insurance required? (1=yes, 0=no)
Personal injury protection (auto insurance) required? (1=yes, 0=no)
Aggravated gambling is a felony (1=yes, 0=no)
Express prohibition on Internet gambling? (1=yes, 0=no)
Some racetrack gaming legal? (1=yes, 0=no)
Some casino gambling legal? (1=yes, 0=no)
Pari-mutuel wagering legalized? (=1 if yes, =0 if no)
Charitable gaming permitted? (=1 if yes, =0 if no)
Slot games legal outside casinos & tracks? (=1 if yes, =0 if no)
Sports betting legal? (1=yes, 0=no)
Roman candles, firecrackers, and skyrockets permitted, size limitations OK (1=yes, 0=no)
Some federally permitted fireworks legal (1=yes, 0=no)
Wire or wood sticks and/or novelty sparklers legal (1=yes, 0=no)
fireworks sales legal year round (1=yes, 0=no)
Physician-assisted suicide legalized? (=1 if yes, =0 if no)
Statewide trans-fat ban in restaurants? (1=yes, 0=no)
Charter schools law? (=1 if yes, =0 if no)
Publicly funded voucher law? (=1 if yes, =0 if no)
Tax credit/deduction law for scholarship contributions or educational expenses of parents? (1=yes, 0=no)
Homeschooling explicitly permitted by statute? (=1 if yes, =0 if no, must use alternative options)
Teacher qualifications required? (=1 if some qualifications required under all homeschooling options, =0 if some homeschooling options do not require teaching qualifications)
Law permitting public school teachers to teach "weaknesses of "evolution"? (1=yes, 0=no)
State Wetland Restoration Program (=1 if yes)
State Mandated Local Plans (=1 if yes)
Internal Consistency (=1 if state imposes requirement that zoning be based upon and consistent with the legally adopted comprehensive plan)
Cap on greenhouse gas emissions from electric power producers? (1=yes, 0=no)
Local rent control laws exist? (1=yes, 0=no)
Prevailing wage law? 1=yes, 0=no
General right-to-work law? 1=yes, 0=no
Employer-provided workers' compensation mandated? 1=yes, 0=no
Workers' compensation optional for certain agricultural workers? 1=yes, 0=no
Private workers' compensation insurers permitted? 1=yes, 0=no
Employer self-insurance for workers' compensation permitted? 1=yes, 0=no
State funds offer workers' compensation insurance? 1=yes, 0=no
Short-term disability insurance program? 1=yes, 0=no
Paid family leave insurance program? (1=yes, 0=no)
Employer verification of legal resident status (1=required of all employers, 0=not required of all employers)
Guaranteed issue of health plans for self-employed or groups of one? (1=yes, 0=no)
Individual health insurance: elimination riders banned? (1=yes, 0=no)
Mandated external review for certain types of grievances? (=1 if yes, =0 if no)
Bans on financial incentives to providers to withhold covered care? (=1 if yes, =0 if no)
Mandates direct access to providers? (=1 if yes, =0 if no)
Standing referrals to specialists mandated? (=1 if yes, =0 if no)
Licensing of Health Plan Medical Directors (=1 if yes, =0 if no)
Newborns
"Mandate-free" or "mandate-light" health insurance policies permitted? (1=yes, 0=no)
Individual health insurance mandate? 1=yes, 0=no
Regulations on Internet purchases? (=1 if yes, =0 if no or minimal)
Deregulation Retail Sales of Electricity
Telecommunication deregulation
Cable Legislation for State Issued Franchise Companies
Are nurse practitioners allowed to practice independently from MDs? (1=yes,0=no)
Member of Nurse Licensure Compact, permitting multistate practice? (1=yes, 0=no)
enacted eminent domain reform through legislation or initiative, or court decision putting strict limits on "public use" (=1 if yes, 0 if no, including judicial action)
Member of interstate insurance product regulation compact (1=yes, 0=no)
Certificate of need requirement for hospitals? (1=yes, 0=no)
state rate classification prohibitions for some classes of insurance (age, gender, credit rating, territory, etc.)? (1=yes, 0=no)
Abortion must be performed by licensed physician? (1=yes, 0=no)
Some abortions required to be performed in a hospital? (1=yes, 0=no)
Some abortions require involvement of second physician? (1=yes, 0=no)
Gestational limit on abortions? (1=yes, 0=no)
State has law prohibiting partial birth abortion, with health exception? (1=yes, 0=no) (Note: the health exception renders the law likely to pass judicial review.)
State uses own funds to pay for abortions beyond required federal minimum? (1=yes, 0=no)
State restricts coverage of abortion in private insurance plans to cases in which woman's life would be endangered? (1=yes, 0=no)
State mandated waiting period before abortion? (1=yes, 0=no)
State requires parental notification and/or consent for minor's decision to have an abortion? (1=yes, 0=no) (note: does not count if attending physician may waive)
State requires parental consent for minor's decision to have an abortion? (1=yes, 0=no) (note: does not count if attending physician may waive)
Does the state have the death penalty? (1=yes, 0=no)
Blood Test Required (=1 if yes, 0 if no)
Some public financing for political parties available? (1=yes, 0=no)
Is the source of public funds a voluntary tax add-on only? (1=yes, 0=no)
